target_audience: Millennials and Gen Z (ages 22-40) who have 'subscription fatigue' and want to save money but hate confrontation.

content.visual_hook: POV: You're on hold for 45 minutes trying to cancel a streaming service, with increasingly annoying hold music playing. You look increasingly frustrated.
content.spoken_audio_script:
(Sound of increasingly irritating hold music) 
VOICEOVER (Slightly frantic): Me trying to cancel that streaming service I haven't used in 6 months... 
(Cut to a shot of a user staring blankly at their phone, looking defeated) 
VOICEOVER: ...and getting stuck in the automated phone tree from HELL. 
(Text overlay: 'Is this your vibe?') 
VOICEOVER: Then the chatbot asks me for my grandmother's maiden name and my firstborn's favorite color. 
(Cut to a shot of a user looking stressed, then a quick shot of the SubSlash AI app interface) 
VOICEOVER: Y'all, there's a better way. SubSlash AI scans your statements, finds those forgotten subs, and negotiates cancellations FOR you. 
(Text overlay: 'SubSlash AI: Cancel anything, effortlessly.') 
VOICEOVER: Seriously, it's like having a personal assistant who *enjoys* arguing with customer service. 
(Final shot: User smiling, looking relieved, with the SubSlash AI logo prominent)
